message: Hey guys. Been working at the idea for a while now. Used some Design Thinking methodology to synthesize a social web experience with task management and sharing. The company is Yorco and our first product is Yorco Task. Love to get some feedback - http://yor.co and my email is robb@yor.co if you want to email some thoughts. Thanks!

a couple design flaws "the story" anchor should show the the that whole section so you may want to make the font smaller or make the post less, on the "join us" part the sides aren't equal width, also the join the beta list takes me to the join us part which idk if that different then the "be first in" part? so maybe just make that clear

Thanks man! We're definitely working on that. Just trying to get that stuff up as quick as possible and get good feedback... All that MVP stuff. Saw your work on GitHub. Looks great man. What are some places the front-end convore stuff is working right now?
and here is a list of the features https://github.com/italiano40/convore-php-forum/wiki/ChangeLog

@robbschiller thank you, and right now it is very alpha and everyday i am finding bugs but the most update place to test it out is http://convore-forum.fluxflex.com which actually pulls right from the repo when there is a push

So the image on the mac looks very complex, can I suggest you try to keep the UI simple and images for us potential customers even simpler. Sounds like a good idea though, keep it simple - don't make me think ;-)
I definitely signed up for the beta list. :)

Awesome! Thanks for the thoughts @hasbo and thanks for signing up @andrew_a_west stoked to keep in touch with you guys. We've made a few changes/updates to the site. Love to know if you think it's a bit more simple.
Andrew the past is not the future man will create tech with it
Andrew the past is not the future man will create tech with it
